ISSUE.TITLE: Can't read logo for PDF documents when pictures are stored in Azure Blob
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.6 Steps to reproduce the problem: > NopFileProvider fails to read a thumbnail from Azure Blob Storage Source: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/6588#issuecomment-1799803617

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7071 Removed customer model validation when changing password

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7151 Fixed logo reading for PDF documents when pictures are stored in Azure Blob
